other_title: Les trois charmantes jeunes filles magiques (French)
Mami, Emi, Pelsia: Adesugata Mahô no Sannin Musume (Japanese)
plot: They eat together, wearing kimono and having their hair in buns, causing them to change into their alter egos. To transform back Mami, Emi, and Pelsia go to a hotsrping together and recite tongue twisters, which is probably nonsense.
